Tomography Utilities (fd_greens.utils.tomography_utils)

state_tomography(circ: qiskit.circuit.quantumcircuit.QuantumCircuit, q_instance: Optional[qiskit.utils.quantum_instance.QuantumInstance] = None) → numpy.ndarray[source]

Performs state tomography on a quantum circuit.

Parameters

  • circ – The quantum circuit to perform tomography on.

  • q_instance – The QuantumInstance to execute the circuit.

Returns

rho_fit – The density matrix obtained from state tomography.

append_tomography_gates(circ: qiskit.circuit.quantumcircuit.QuantumCircuit, qubits: Iterable[Union[int, qiskit.circuit.quantumregister.Qubit]], label: Tuple[str]) → qiskit.circuit.quantumcircuit.QuantumCircuit[source]

Appends tomography gates to a circuit.

Parameters

  • circ – The circuit to which tomography gates are to be appended.

  • qubits – The qubits to be tomographed.

  • label – The tomography states label.

Returns

tomo_circ – A new circuit with tomography gates appended.

append_measurement_gates(circ: qiskit.circuit.quantumcircuit.QuantumCircuit) → qiskit.circuit.quantumcircuit.QuantumCircuit[source]

Appends measurement gates to a circuit.

Parameters

circ – The circuit to which measurement gates are to be appended.

Returns

circ_new – A new circuit with measurement gates appended.
